skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Ladyâ€™s Mantle
skillTree.description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

skillTree.name: Experienced Plunderer
skillTree.description: Having spent much of his time delving through archaic crypts and ruined temples, Rodrik has a keen eye for valuables.

skillTree.name: True Hero of Bretonnia
skillTree.description: This man is a paragon of Bretonnia. It is a privilege to serve at his side.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Quality Feed
skillTree.description: Bretonnia is renowned for its unstoppable cavalry. They have spent centuries perfecting the feeding regime of their mounts.

skillTree.name: Selective Abhorrence
skillTree.description: Reserve your loathing for the evil and the monstrous, and hate them with all of your fury.

skillTree.name: Self-Centered
skillTree.description: This one is an appalling force of death on the battlefield. He stampedes ahead at the slightest provocation, completely oblivious to those under his command.

skillTree.name: Egocentric
skillTree.description: If you are not capable of killing them yourself then I bid that you stand aside so that I may, whelp!

skillTree.name: Blessing of the Lady
skillTree.description: This one, whether he knows it or not, has the favour of the Lady. She will aid him whenever he is in dire peril.

skillTree.name: Blinding Majesty
skillTree.description: You need only a fleeting glimpse of the light emanating from this knight to know that he has been chosen by the Lady.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Grail Banishment" that lowers all resistances

skillTree.name: Storied Hero
skillTree.description: When you defend your homeland side-by-side with a living legend you become a part of his story.

effects.description: Melee defence: +2 when in own or friendly territory

skillTree.name: Banish the Damned
skillTree.description: We shall not allow their unholy taint to mar the beauty of our lands any longer! Ride them down!

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 when fighting against Undead
Melee defence: +6 when fighting against Undead
Melee defence: +12 when fighting against Undead

skillTree.name: Holy Light
skillTree.description: This Paladin's virtuous radiance inspires his troops to leap into the fray.

skillTree.name: Commander's Discipline
skillTree.description: Ensuring his men stay engaged takes some of the weight away from this Paladin's sword arm.

skillTree.name: Share the Feed
skillTree.description: The truly chivalrous are charitable too.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -3% for cavalry units
Vigour loss reduction: -6% for cavalry units
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for cavalry units

skillTree.name: Renowned
skillTree.description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe Iâ€™ve found something of interest...

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: Iâ€™ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Junglist
skillTree.description: Having spent most of his time living in the jungle, this feels like home.

effects.description: Double experience gain for units when fighting against Lizardmen
When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
